title: Awesome List Updates on Aug 15, 2024
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Aug 15, 2024 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [ez-compinit (‚≠ê22)](https://github.com/mattmc3/ez-compinit) - Wraps `compinit`, queueing up calls to `compdef`, and hooking the real `compinit` call to an event that runs at the end of your `.zshrc`. That way you get all the benefits of calling `compinit` early without any of the downsides.
*   [shellcolor (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/SaltedBlowfish/zsh-shellcolor) - Changes the terminal background color based on the presence of a `.shellcolor` in the current directory.
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • ez-compinit (‚≠ê22) - Wraps compinit, queueing up calls to compdef, and hooking the real compinit call to an event that runs at the end of your .zshrc. That way you get all the benefits of calling compinit early without any of the downsides.
  • shellcolor (‚≠ê4) - Changes the terminal background color based on the presence of a .shellcolor in the current directory.

items.title: Awesome Browser Extensions for Github
items.content_text: ### [GitHub Repo Size (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/harshjv/github-repo-size) Automatically adds repository size to GitHub's repository summary. Installs: 20000 | Stars: 1211 | Last update: n/a

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Utilities / Window Management

*   [Loop (‚≠ê8.6k)](https://github.com/MrKai77/Loop) - Window management made elegant. [Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware") [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software")](https://github.com/MrKai77/Loop)

### Third Party App Markets / Package Managers

*   [Cork](https://corkmac.app) - An intuitive and complete Homebrew GUI written in SwiftUI that supports all Homebrew features. [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software")](https://github.com/buresdv/cork)
items.content_html:
Utilities / Window Management

  • Loop (‚≠ê8.6k) - Window management made elegant. Freeware

Third Party App Markets / Package Managers

  • Cork - An intuitive and complete Homebrew GUI written in SwiftUI that supports all Homebrew features.

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### Monitoring

*   [SweetUptime](https://dicloud.net/sweetuptime-server-uptime-monitoring/) ‚Äî Server monitoring, uptime monitoring, DNS & domain monitoring. Monitor 10 server, 10 uptime, and 10 domain for free.
items.content_html:
Monitoring

  • SweetUptime ‚Äî Server monitoring, uptime monitoring, DNS & domain monitoring. Monitor 10 server, 10 uptime, and 10 domain for free.

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Networking

*   [sdns (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/semihalev/sdns) - A high-performance, recursive DNS resolver server with DNSSEC support, focused on preserving privacy.

### Other Software / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

*   [JuiceFS (‚≠ê12k)](https://github.com/juicedata/juicefs) - Distributed POSIX file system built on top of Redis and AWS S3.
*   [sonic (‚≠ê2.1k)](https://github.com/go-sonic/sonic) - Sonic is a Go Blogging Platform. Simple and Powerful.
items.content_html:
Networking

  • sdns (‚≠ê1k) - A high-performance, recursive DNS resolver server with DNSSEC support, focused on preserving privacy.

Other Software / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

  • JuiceFS (‚≠ê12k) - Distributed POSIX file system built on top of Redis and AWS S3.
  • sonic (‚≠ê2.1k) - Sonic is a Go Blogging Platform. Simple and Powerful.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Carousels / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-darkbox-gallery-library (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/failed-successfully/ngx-darkbox-gallery-library) - A highly configurable lightbox themed gallery library for Angular applications using the Ivy engine (Angular 15+).

### Editor Components / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [slate-angular (‚≠ê185)](https://github.com/worktile/slate-angular) - Angular view layer for [Slate (‚≠ê31k)](https://github.com/ianstormtaylor/slate).

### Additional / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [@tethys/store (‚≠ê60)](https://github.com/worktile/store) - A mini, yet powerful state management library for Angular.
items.content_html:
Carousels / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-darkbox-gallery-library (‚≠ê5) - A highly configurable lightbox themed gallery library for Angular applications using the Ivy engine (Angular 15+).

Editor Components / Google Developer Experts

  • slate-angular (‚≠ê185) - Angular view layer for Slate (‚≠ê31k).

Additional / Google Developer Experts

  • @tethys/store (‚≠ê60) - A mini, yet powerful state management library for Angular.

items.title: Awesome Rust
items.content_text:
### Libraries / Image processing

*   [Enet4/dicom-rs (‚≠ê476)](https://github.com/Enet4/dicom-rs) - A pure Rust implementation of the DICOM standard, allowing users to work with DICOM objects and interact with DICOM applications, while aiming to be fast, safe, and intuitive to use.
items.content_html:
Libraries / Image processing

  • Enet4/dicom-rs (‚≠ê476) - A pure Rust implementation of the DICOM standard, allowing users to work with DICOM objects and interact with DICOM applications, while aiming to be fast, safe, and intuitive to use.
